Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
Grips = { Normal = CFrame.new(0, -0.5, 0.649999976, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1), Firing = CFrame.new(0, -0.5, 0.649999976, 1, 0, 0, -0, 0.992277861, 0.124034733, 0, -0.124034733, 0.992277861) }
BaseTextureId = 162829035
Meshes = { {Id = 163459324, Name = "Waffle", Size = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, 0.5), Height = -0.25, Angle = CFrame.Angles(math.pi, math.pi, 0), FaceCFrame = CFrame.new(0,0,-0.5) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi,0,0.15)}, {Id = 163459238, Name = "Bacon", Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.25, 0.5), Height = -0.4, Angle = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, math.pi), FaceCFrame = CFrame.new(-0.1125, -0.675, -0.35) * CFrame.Angles(((math.pi / 2) - 0.1), -0.2, (math.pi - 0.275))}, {Id = 163459259, Name = "Egg1", Size = Vector3.new(0.75, 0.25, 0.6), Height = -0.3, Angle = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, math.pi), FaceCFrame = CFrame.new(0.2, -0.64, 0.25) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, (math.pi - 0.2))}, {Id = 163459304, Name = "Egg2", Size = Vector3.new(0.25, 0.2, 0.3), Height = -0.3, Angle = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, -math.pi / 1.25), FaceCFrame = CFrame.new(0.4, -0.55, 0.3) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2) + 0.05, 1.1, math.pi)} }
CurrentMesh = 0
ReloadTime = 0.25
Projectile = Instance.new("Part") Projectile.Name = "Projectile" Projectile.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Projectile.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Projectile.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Projectile.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Projectile.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Projectile.Size = Vector3.new(0.25, 0.25, 0.25) Projectile.CanCollide = true Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. BaseTextureId Mesh.Parent = Projectile
ContentProvider:Preload("http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. BaseTextureId)
for i, v in pairs(Meshes) do ContentProvider:Preload("http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. v.Id) end
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function PositionProjectile(handle, x, y, z) local HandleClone = handle:Clone() local HandleCloneY = HandleClone:Clone() HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame - HandleCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * y local HandleCloneZ = HandleCloneY:Clone() HandleCloneZ.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * z local HandleCloneX = HandleCloneZ:Clone() HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0) HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneX.CFrame - HandleCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * x return HandleCloneX.CFrame end
function Activated() if Tool.Enabled then Tool.Enabled = false Tool.Grip = Grips.Firing CurrentMesh = (CurrentMesh + 1) if CurrentMesh > #Meshes then CurrentMesh = 1 end local SelectedMesh = Meshes[CurrentMesh] local ProjectileClone = Projectile:Clone() ProjectileClone.Size = SelectedMesh.Size ProjectileClone.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. SelectedMesh.Id local BreakfastPart = ProjectileClone:Clone() BreakfastPart.Name = SelectedMesh.Name BreakfastPart.CanCollide = false local BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, ProjectileClone:GetMass() * 196.20, 0) BodyForce.Parent = ProjectileClone local Position = Vector3.new(0, SelectedMesh.Height, ((Handle.Size.Z / 2) + (Projectile.Size.Z / 2) + 0.25)) ProjectileClone.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and Hit.Name ~= Projectile.Name then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then local head = character:FindFirstChild("Head") if head then local BreakfastFace = character:FindFirstChild("BreakfastFace") if not BreakfastFace and CurrentMesh == 1 then BreakfastFace = Instance.new("Model") BreakfastFace.Name = "BreakfastFace" BreakfastFace.Parent = character end if BreakfastFace and not BreakfastFace:FindFirstChild(SelectedMesh.Name) then local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = head Weld.Part1 = BreakfastPart Weld.C1 = SelectedMesh.FaceCFrame Weld.Parent = BreakfastPart BreakfastPart.Parent = BreakfastFace end end end if not character or character ~= Character then ProjectileClone:Destroy() end end end) Debris:AddItem(ProjectileClone, 5) ProjectileClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") local TargetPoint = Humanoid.TargetPoint ProjectileClone.CFrame = PositionProjectile(Handle, Position.X, Position.Y, Position.Z) ProjectileClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(ProjectileClone.Position, TargetPoint) ProjectileClone.CFrame = ProjectileClone.CFrame * SelectedMesh.Angle ProjectileClone.Velocity = CFrame.new(ProjectileClone.Position, TargetPoint).lookVector * 75 wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Grip = Grips.Normal Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Character or not Humanoid then return end Equipped = true Tool.Grip = Grips.Normal if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
